name: @wp-hooks/wordpress-core
description: All the actions and filters from WordPress core in machine-readable JSON format.
author: John Blackbourn

scripts.check:duplicate-actions: bash -c " diff <(jq '.hooks | map(.name) | sort' hooks/actions.json) <(jq '.hooks | map(.name) | unique | sort' hooks/actions.json)"
scripts.check:duplicate-filters: bash -c " diff <(jq '.hooks | map(.name) | sort' hooks/filters.json) <(jq '.hooks | map(.name) | unique | sort' hooks/filters.json)"
